definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Knell beetles have also been known to be used as mounts by Underdark races.
sentences.chinese: 已經知道喪鐘甲蟲會被幽暗地域的種族用作坐騎。

sentences.english: For example, scarabs in the form of the beetle insect were believed to be the symbol of new life.
sentences.chinese: 例如，甲殼蟲外形的聖甲蟲被認爲是新生的象徵。

sentences.english: The Egyptian sacred scarab is a dung beetle.
sentences.chinese: 埃及聖甲蟲其實就是蜣螂。

sentences.english: The beetle contains a caustic acid-like juice called cantharidin.
sentences.chinese: 該甲蟲體內含有一種腐蝕性的酸性液體，名爲斑蝥素。

sentences.english: Gerry gore suddenly found himself into big beetle.
sentences.chinese: 格里高爾突然發現本人變成大甲蟲。

sentences.english: You could talk to the Beetle.
sentences.chinese: 你可以和甲蟲車進行交流。

sentences.english: The bat, is to take fly kind and beetle as food mainly.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠，主要是以蠅類和甲蟲爲食。

sentences.english: These beetles make sausage-shaped brood chambers along the tunnels.
sentences.chinese: 這些甲蟲順着地道建造香腸形狀的產房。

sentences.english: It is the Lady Bug and Beetle Kingdoms that address you today.
sentences.chinese: 今天瓢蟲王國和甲蟲王國向你問候。

sentences.english: The scarab beetle was the symbol of Spontaneous Generation, New Life, and Resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 聖甲蟲是新生命和復活自然發生的符號。

sentences.english: I , said the Beetle , With my thread and needle, I'll make the shroud.
sentences.chinese: 甲蟲說，是我，用我的針和線，我會來做壽衣。

sentences.english: Were Reavers really taken out of the game?
sentences.chinese: 金甲蟲真的從遊戲裏剔除了嗎？

sentences.english: There were ants, lacewings, ladybirds, and beetles.
sentences.chinese: 裏面有螞蟻，草蜻蛉，瓢蟲，和甲蟲。
達爾文收集化石和甲蟲。

sentences.english: The scarab image was used for recording historical events.
sentences.chinese: 聖甲蟲像用於記錄歷史性事件。

sentences.english: This vein cutting is just one method the beetles used to prepare a safe meal.
sentences.chinese: 切斷葉脈只是甲蟲準備安全食物的一個方法。

definition: to have no sense of shame/brazen
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise

marginalized people (not part of mainstream society)/marginal man (term coined by social psychologist Kurt Lewin, referring to a person in transition between two cultures or social groups, not fully belonging to either)
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
